Articles.Content:
While it was my turn I switched to a few spacecraft that had landed in previous versions. Stuff exploded.

Lucky, I quicksaved before that.
Yah here it "was"...
Huh. Well, I know not to touch that craft for the time being...

Putting the link up for the next guy:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/b20vs42nrmk68t6/persistent.sfs

I didn't do anything major to anything that was already there; instead, I put a rover and a small base core on Minmus. For the rover, I'd highly advise disabling the motors on the rear wheels, as otherwise it likes to do backflips. Driving is kinda hilarious on Minmus due to the low gravity, and I'd advise remapping the rover controls to the translation ones but having your fingers ready to control pod torque anyway.

That said, if you know what you're doing, you can make the rover breakdance

Also, a screenshot showing the rover and base together, along with pilot Tombree Kerman:
Nice! Tophir youre up!
OK, I'll get started.
i just need to say that i lost my persistent in a computer crash
oops. that isnt good...

Well sadly I was not able to get much done, actually nothing done. My gpu was having problems loading any space craft I switched to or tried to launch. So just use the persistence file Specialist put up. Good luck to the next guy.
ok hotmailcompany52 you are go!
Ok, im gonna put up Mun Base MK. 2 with 2 cores and hab module. I have a feeling that this is gonna be hard...
Well, I think im done ive added a Mun Base MK 2 with 3 kerbals aboard it.
[EDIT: Sorry, I was thinking back to the Community Mun Base where there was a 24 hour flight window,.]
hotmail i need the persist.

*Facepalm*

Here: http://www./view/7plqy4ogfu95cpq/persistent.sfs

no problem hotmail..

ok RedDwarf IV you are up!

EDIT: It seems your link isnt working...
Damn, can i sort it out tomorrow because RedDwarf doesn't have anybody after him?
ok sure! thats fine with me!

Yay! I liked my previous save better anyway.

http://www.2shared.com/file/ljMjK6rO/persistent.html

[i did do an update straight from the link on the front page, but my ascent profile was wrong and I used too much fuel to land the descent stage as well as the rover. The rover survived, but I didn't get a pretty landing site.]

Ok, the one on the frount is outdated this is the latest one now:http://www./download/7plqy4ogfu95cpq/persistent.sfs. But you can either do the whole thing again or just hyperedit it back up in the new save.
I thought you said you were going to do it after me because you were having problems?
I wasn't having problems, mediafire broke the link i posted then i asked Zekes whether it was ok that i could sort it out tomorrow which he said yes to so i sorted it our this morning.

OK link works now! RedDwarf you can go now.

http://www./download/7plqy4ogfu95cpq/persistent.sfs

---------------------------------

Edited June 9, 2013 by J0hnsmine
So, can i sign up for the 17th?
